Reviews.Title: Good phone great price
Reviews.Author: Rhass
Reviews.Content: This is a good phone by the range of the Samsung Ace II. Also if you are from Venezuela it will work perfectly!

Reviews.Title: Works in Barbados on Digicel Network
Reviews.Author: CaribbeanChic
Reviews.Content: Super happy. takes a little getting used ti but i like it a lot.not for persons who like to fully customize their phones will wallpapers and all that. i loves it.

Reviews.Title: Worth more than its price
Reviews.Author: Ehsan
Reviews.Content: It looks and feels like a high-end cell phone. It has all the features that I need. The price is extremely reasonable.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Basic+ Phone
Reviews.Author: Lanay "Podcast and Audiobook listener."
Reviews.Content: I unexpectedly received a fully unlocked Lumia 525 RM-998 for the $139 price! It's just like the 520 except it has 1GB of RAM. It uses a Micro Sim and a Micro SD of up to 64GB. Nokia Lumia 525 8GB White Factory Unlocked GSM - International Version phoneThe Bluetooth transfer of my old phone data was a snap. The phone calls I've made are clear with extremely good sound quality. I found free apps to my liking on the Windows Store. The pics I've taken with the camera are also good quality.Music and pics can easily be saved to the SD card, keeping the phone's storage free.This replaced my old Apple, and I'm very happy with it.  A great buy, highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: VERY GOOD, PRICE EXCELLENT
Reviews.Author: jose luis rodriguez
Reviews.Content: VERY GOOD, PRICE EXCELLENT. SOFTWARE VERY FAST. ONLY IT'S DONT HAVE A CAMERA IN FORNT. BUT FUNTIONALITY IS AMAZING .. GOOD

Reviews.Title: International version doesn't work with straight talk
Reviews.Author: Greg Turke "Gregg"
Reviews.Content: Did not work with straight talk. Only 3G. Get the ATT domestic version!Other than that... it's awesome! Lots of features, fast shipping!

Reviews.Title: Phone is NOT UNLOCKED!!!
Reviews.Author: Md Ali
Reviews.Content: I read all the wonderful reviews about the phone. I agree with those reviews but I realized that there weren't any reviews whether the phone was really unlocked as described. But I took a risk. This phone came in a week, which was not so bad. When I was tracking this product, it said that it would come from FedEx but instead it came from UPS  (which is not really that much of a importance to me). I was very happy when it came. There were many, many features in the phone.Pros:· Very (surprisingly) crisp, clear photos· You can also record videos· Games· A Children's Corner (so that you won't have to worry about your child messing up your phone)· Web (which is obvious)· Word, PowerPoint, Excel· Packaging was very good· Was brand new· More features (that I really didn't have much time of going through)Cons: · PHONE IS NOT UNLOCKED!!!  The main reason that I bought the Nokia Lumia 520 was because it was said to be unlocked. I contacted Amazon's customer service and they gave back the full amount that I payed and I didn't have to pay anything to return my phone. I'm a very loyal Amazon customer because I never had to give back anything and this is the first thing that I have to give back. But, anyway, it isn't Amazon's fault since they don't directly sell this item who I'm grateful that I got my money back.  I was very sad/disappointed when I found out that this phone is not unlocked (I went to a store to put in a son and they said that this phone is actually unlocked).  Overall, if you don't mind that it's locked than I highly recommend this wonderful Nokia Lumia 520 phone

Reviews.Title: excellent phone, very cheap and comes fully unlocked
Reviews.Author: Isaac C.
Reviews.Content: definitely worth it compared to this phone. I recommend it because it is cheap and has everything a nokia can offer

Reviews.Title: My new favorite phone!
Reviews.Author: Miranda
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love this phone, it came super quick, works amazingly, and I couldn't be happier! Came fully unlocked, in English, wish all the accessories and a start up books! I'd been wanting a Lumia for some time now, after getting my Windows 8 laptop. I love the OS, but I know some people don't, so I'd advise you to go to Best Buy and test out Windows 8 to make sure you like the OS. After HATING my iPhone for 3 years (i've gone through 3, they've all broken and malfunctioned) I couldn't wait for my upgrade, and i'm so happy i didn't, i'll be buying this phone again.

Reviews.Title: not 4g
Reviews.Author: Muggins
Reviews.Content: remains unopened due to restocking fee. previous review not printed by amazon. wanted 4 g not 3g which this is described as.

Reviews.Title: Arrived fast and as advertised
Reviews.Author: Greg Weber
Reviews.Content: Shipping was fast and the phone arrived as advertised.  Had to convert to English format from Chinese but other than that, its a great phone that fits my needs

Reviews.Title: Good for the price, powerful, but terrible camera...
Reviews.Author: PR
Reviews.Content: This is a great phone if you need something cheap but loaded with features. Here are the things I like:PROS:1. It's fast and fluid. It just works.2. It's cheap! Can't beat the price3. The screen is nice and the feel of the phone is great.4. It has an offline GPS mode (but there is a slight problem with this...see CONS section)CONS:1. The GPS is only free for local use. If you try using the offline free GPS in another country it will ask you to pay for a licensing fee. That's what happened to me when crossing back and forth from Canada and the USA.2. There is no led light or camera flash on this device. Makes it useless to shoot pictures with at night.3. The keyboard is CRAP! It is seriously terrible... I find that many users like myself end up hitting the comma button repeatedly instead of the space bar. I swear I'm pressing the space bar, but the comma always registers. Also the accuracy of the keyboard is terrible. It makes for an unpleasant experience at times..... I'm not the only one with this issue, as several of my friends have the same problem.Conclusion:Overall, although there are many shortcomings with this phone, it is still good considering the price. I don't think you'd be disappointed with it considering what you get for for the price. But, don't expect perfection, as this phone does fall short in many aspects.

Reviews.Title: Great condition.
Reviews.Author: Jane
Reviews.Content: I didn't know what to expect but item came in great condition. I am very pleased with it so far.

Reviews.Title: Really unlocked
Reviews.Author: Juliana O'Brien
Reviews.Content: It really comes unlocked and also to use abroad. The only thing I didn't like there isn't any flash doe the camera and I haven't seen that.

Reviews.Title: LOVE THIS PHONE!!!!
Reviews.Author: Hannah
Reviews.Content: OK, so after much research I decided that the Nokia Lumia 520 was the right phone for me. This is my first smartphone so I am not able to compare it with androids or iphones, however, from my experience it is a excellent phone for the price! I have had no problems with the texting or phone calls and the internet has been fast with it's 4G speed. I love the phones design, and it has been fun personalizing my home screen and pinning my favorite apps!I am am using this phone through NET10 prepaid monthly cards. I looked into AT&Ts; GO phone plans, but found that I could get a better deal by switching to NET10 . All I had to do was buy a NET10 AT&T; compatible Micro sim card ($1 on amazon) ,this unlocked GSM phone, and a $40 or $50 net10 plan card to make it work. I have been really pleased with how well it has worked! If you use this phone with a plan like Net10, you do have to enter in some APN codes to get internet to work, but it if you Google the codes its pretty simple and the internet was up and running after I did that!So I would highly recommend this unlocked phone to anyone, especially if you are going the prepaid route because it's unlocked.Enjoy!!!

Reviews.Title: A good product
Reviews.Author: JORGE OSCAR CRESCENTE
Reviews.Content: Good relation between  quality and price. Many good aplications and w8 is easy to use.  The format is smart and nice.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT
Reviews.Author: Abby
Reviews.Content: GREAT PHONE, COLOR, SIZE AND DESING. ARRIVED ON TIME. THIS PHONE GOT ALL MY ESPECTATION. IT IS FRIENDLY AND EASY TO USE. JUST LOVE IT!

Reviews.Title: Perfect for my mom.
Reviews.Author: Fatima M.
Reviews.Content: I'm from Venezuela, I use this cellphone with Digitel and It works fine! My mom loves it. Check this case http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B00CTL5RF6/ref=cm_cr_ryp_prd_ttl_sol_2

Reviews.Title: Nice phone!!
Reviews.Author: Elisee
Reviews.Content: I am still getting use to a windows phone, but so far I am pleased , it's a really nice phone with a little too many features and useless apps and settings (to me though).It was supposed to be factory unlocked but I still see a lot of AT&T; options and stuffs in it which I do not like.Love having office on my phone that helps a lot.

Reviews.Title: A phone worth buying.
Reviews.Author: Njao J
Reviews.Content: The first thing that greeted me right from the box was a flimsy operators manual written in Italiano.  All my curiosity was suppressed at first, and I was about to return the entire package and give it 2 stars. However, I toyed with it for a while and figured out how to reset the phone to English language. I am glad I did so, this phone is amazing and so far I love everything including super crispy pictures and videos. It can only use a micro SIM card and I had to have mine downsized at phone store.  I am planning to get another one before they go extinct.

Reviews.Title: Nice with all the functions I need!
Reviews.Author: Hung K Ng
Reviews.Content: The price of this phone is very good, and it has all the functions as all those expensive phones.It's a windows phone, there are not as many apps available as those of android ones though.I don't get many calls, so the battery usually lasts two or three days without charge.

Reviews.Title: I works well
Reviews.Author: Kayon Blackwood
Reviews.Content: This phone works well but I just hate the fact that it doesn't allow me to multitask when I am on a call by going to facebook or whatsapp. Other wise it is a great phone.

Reviews.Title: very very bad battery
Reviews.Author: Suresh Gunja "soori"
Reviews.Content: i wont recommend this phone at all the battery wont even last one hour.every hour we have keep phone charging

Reviews.Title: Excelent for the price range
Reviews.Author: Rooianor
Reviews.Content: This is a great little phone.  It is light, responsive, and has an adequate selection of apps for my needs. It did arrive in Italian, but this was easy changed to English in the settings. (Helped to know Spanish.) The weakest part of the phone would be the camera.  It is not bad for a quick upload to Facebook or Twitter, but nothing more.

Reviews.Title: Quality over price!
Reviews.Author: David
Reviews.Content: This is a perfect choice of style, quality and price!The colors that captured by camera are really juicy, but still needs more megapixeles for perfect high resolution pictures.

Reviews.Title: Great international phone
Reviews.Author: Sank
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my son who's studying in Israel of the next three years. He loves it. After years of Android use he's found this phone and the windows operating system to be intuitive, powerful and very well designed. Loves the connection to Skpe and Skydrive.

Reviews.Title: IT TAKES ONLY MICRO SIMS will not work with a regular sim
Reviews.Author: Murielle Desir
Reviews.Content: I did not know this but overall it is a good phone a really good phone needs more apps you will need to cut a regular sim if you thought it would work with one not cut

Reviews.Title: I love the phone! But hate the OS
Reviews.Author: Daniel Sanchez
Reviews.Content: Windows OS sucks, there was no way they could have made it more complicated! Would love this phone with android, great resolution, sound, camera...
